snippet: Westbrook Partners and Normandy Real Estate must resolve thousands of building violations and provide tenants with rebates for illegal fees and overcharges.
abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman announces that he has reached settlement with Westbrook Partners and Normandy Real Estate over their management of rent-regulated apartment buildings; will require the landlords to make repairs, resolve thousands of building violations and provide tenants with rebates for illegal fees and overcharges totaling more than $1 million.
lead_paragraph: Westbrook Partners and Normandy Real Estate must resolve thousands of building violations and provide tenants with rebates for illegal fees and overcharges.

headline.main: Landlords to Repay Over $1 Million in Fees
headline.print_headline: Landlords to Repay Over $1 Million in Fees
